info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 5:01PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WITH MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SOUTHERN FULTON...EASTERN ALBANY...EASTERN SCHENECTADY...WESTERN SCHENECTADY...MONTGOMERY...AND SOUTHERN SARATOGA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...Scattered snow showers accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 459 PM EST, snow showers were over Tribes Hill, or near Fonda moving east at 25 MPH. THE SNOW SHOWERS WILL BE NEAR...Amsterdam and Fort Johnson around 505 PM EST...Pattersonville-Rotterdam Junction around 515 PM EST... Rotterdam Junction around 520 PM EST... Scotia around 530 PM EST. ...Schenectady, Rotterdam, and East Glenville around 535 PM EST. This includes the following highways... Interstate 88 between exits 24 and 25. Interstate 90 between exits 25 and 28. Interstate 890 between exits 1a and 9. Interstate 87 near exit 10. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
